tag_list: iphone, ios, iphone-app-templates, iphone-app-design, tapha-ngum, tapha, entrepreneur
overview:
Tapha Ngum is a 22 year old entrepreneur from London, England.

After his 2nd startup Dummy Limited failed to show the progress he wanted, he started Tapha Media Ltd, with its flagship product MyAppTemplates.com, to provide custom designed iphone app templates to developers and entrepreneurs who cannot design themeselves or cannot afford great design. It is basically to iphone apps what wordpress themes are to blogs.
